text: Paraguay national football team is the national football team of Paraguay. ==Most appearances== Pos Player Apps Goals Career 1 Carlos Gamarra 110 12 1993-2006 2 Roberto Miguel Acuña 97 5 1993-2006 3 Celso Ayala 85 6 1993-2003 4 José Saturnino Cardozo 82 25 1991-2006 5 Denis Caniza 79 1 1996-2006 6 Roberto Fernández 78 0 1976-1989 7 Juan Bautista Torales 77 1 1979-1989 8 José Luis Chilavert 74 8 1989-2003 8 Estanislao Struway 74 4 1991-2002 10 Carlos Humberto Paredes 72 10 1998-present ==Top scorers== Pos Player Goals Apps Career 1 José Saturnino Cardozo 25 82 1991-2006 2 Roque Santa Cruz 20 61 1999-present 3 Julio César Romero 13 32 1979-1986 3 Saturnino Arrúa 13 26 1969-1980 5 Carlos Gamarra 12 110 1993-2006 5 Gerardo Rivas 12 32 1921-1926 7 Miguel Ángel Benítez 11 29 1996-1999 8 Carlos Humberto Paredes 10 72 1998-present 8 Aurelio González 10 23 1924-1937 8 Juan Bautista Villalba 10 22 1945-1947 ==References== Category:South American national football teams Category:Football in Paraguay Category:National sports teams of Paraguay
